item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Syntax highlighting
item.description: Code Syntax Highlighting Verify the following code blocks render as code blocks and highlight properly. More about tuning syntax highlighting is the Hugo documentation . Diff *** /path/to/original ''timestamp'' --- /path/to/new ''timestamp'' *************** *** 1 **** ! This is a line. --- 1 --- ! This is a replacement line. It is important to spell -removed line +new line *** /path/to/original ''timestamp'' --- /path/to/new ''timestamp'' *************** *** 1 **** !
